import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p_index = 1
    q_index = 1
    for i in range(n):
        if p[i] < p[i+1]:
            p_index = i
        if q[i] < q[i+1]:
            q_index = i
    print(abs(p_index - q_index))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    a, b = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    print(a*b)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(abs(p.index(1) - q.index(1)))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
